abstract: Go beyond a short-term view of Bank of America’s prime assets, and Jamie Dimon, the JPMorgan Chase chief and unofficial winner of the credit crisis, may need to watch his back.
snippet: Go beyond a short-term view of Bank of America’s prime assets, and Jamie Dimon, the JPMorgan Chase chief and unofficial winner of the credit crisis, may need to watch his back.
lead_paragraph: What’s the best job in financial services? The available chief executive’s seat at the troubled Bank of America may not spring to mind.

headline.main: A Tough Job Now, But a Big Upside
headline.print_headline: A Tough Job Now, But a Big Upside

abstract: Go beyond a short-term view and there may actually be no better job in finance than being in the hot seat at Bank of America, Breakingviews.com says.
snippet: Go beyond a short-term view and there may actually be no better job in finance than being in the hot seat at Bank of America, Breakingviews.com says.
lead_paragraph: What’s the best job in financial services? The available chief executive’s seat at the troubled Bank of America  may not spring to mind.

headline.main: BofA Chief: A Tough Job With a Big Upside?

abstract: Bank of America executives on Wednesday stood by consumer banking chief Brian Moynihan, a leading candidate to be the company’s next chief executive, after two congressmen panned his performance at a hearing over the Merrill Lynch deal.
snippet: Bank of America executives on Wednesday stood by consumer banking chief Brian Moynihan, a leading candidate to be the company’s next chief executive, after two congressmen panned his performance at a hearing over the Merrill Lynch deal.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America executives on Wednesday stood by the head of consumer banking, Brian Moynihan, a leading candidate to be the company’s next chief executive, after two congressmen panned his performance at a hearing on the bank’s purchase of the troubled investment bank Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: After Grilling, BofA Banker is Praised and Panned
